# The `SequenceTraits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class should be specialized by any type that needs to be converted to/from a YAML sequence. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename T, typename EnableIf = void&gt;
struct llvm::yaml::SequenceTraits&lt;T, EnableIf&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class should be specialized by any type that needs to be converted to/from a YAML sequence.

For example:

template&lt;&gt; struct <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/yaml/sequencetraits">SequenceTraits&lt;MyContainer&gt;</a> &#123; static size&#95;t size(IO &amp;io, MyContainer &amp;seq) &#123; return seq.size(); &#125; static MyType&amp; element(IO &amp;, MyContainer &amp;seq, size&#95;t index) &#123; if ( index &gt;= seq.size() ) seq.resize(index+1); return seq&#91;index&#93;; &#125; &#125;;

Definition at line 247 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/yamltraits-h">YAMLTraits.h</a>.

</DoxygenPage>
